name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself with Modern Warfare III live wallpapers, plus a search bar and quick-access icons for powerful browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the high-stakes action of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III to your browser with this Live Wallpaper Chrome extension! Each new tab unveils high-definition, animated scenes from the latest chapter in the Modern Warfare series, featuring intense combat visuals, explosive environments, and elite operators in action. Ideal for CoD fans, this extension captures the thrill and immersion of the game, bringing the battlefield directly to your browser.

The extension also includes a built-in Google search bar for seamless browsing and customizable quick-access icons, making it easy to reach your favorite sites with just a click. This blend of striking visuals and practical tools ensures that every new tab is both efficient and exhilarating.

Perfect for those who live and breathe CoD, the Modern Warfare III Live Wallpaper extension turns each new tab into a pulse-pounding experience from one of the most iconic FPS games.

Features:

Modern Warfare III Live Wallpaper: High-definition animated scenes from Modern Warfare III.
Google Search Bar: Integrated search for easy, efficient web browsing.
Customizable Quick-Access Icons: Personalize shortcuts to favorite sites.
High-Quality Combat Visuals: Captures the intensity and realism of Modern Warfare.
Immersive and Functional: Blends action-packed visuals with efficient tools.
Ideal for CoD Fans: Brings game excitement to every tab.
